name: ONScipter Plus
tagline: ONScripter forked with a different UI for Android
body:
Current version: v1.0

Google Play Store: [ONScripter Plus App](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.onscripter.plus&hl=en)

## What is this?
Play ONScripter (visual novel) games on your Android phone.

![Narcissu](https://raw.github.com/wiki/matthewn4444/onscripter-plus-android/images/playing.PNG)

## How do I set this up
[View link](https://github.com/matthewn4444/onscripter-plus-android/wiki/Setting-up-a-Visual-Novel) to setup games and play them on your phone

## View the wiki pages to get more information

* [Features](https://github.com/matthewn4444/onscripter-plus-android/wiki/Features)
* [Compile source](https://github.com/matthewn4444/onscripter-plus-android/wiki/Compile-from-source)

## Thanks
Thanks to Studio O.G.A. for the original source code and instructions to compile.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
